arts.sum: The business end of the season. Eight games left, both Bayer Leverkusen and Bochum have things to play for – Leverkusen the title, Bochum relegation. Leverkusne laid down the gauntlet…

arts.ttl: Leverkusen keep pressure on Bayern with win over Bochum
arts.sum: Victor Boniface scored the decisive goal as Bayer Leverkusen kept up the pressure on Bayern Munich with a 3-1 win over Bochum.

arts.ttl: Bayern prepared to make sacrifices to sign Wirtz, Sky suggests
arts.sum: Florian Wirtz is the number one priority in summer for the record champions.

arts.ttl: Leverkusen among other clubs chasing Koln talent
arts.sum: Die Werkself have reportedly been keeping tabs on the young German for some time.

arts.ttl: Leverkusen cool their pursuit of Nurnberg's Jander, BILD reports
arts.sum: The highly rated talent is being sought after by several clubs from Germany, England and Belgium.

arts.ttl: Can Leverkusen actually beat Bayern to the Bundesliga again?
arts.sum: For those who follow a football league purely for a title contest, Bayer Leverkusen's Aufholjagd had double meaning just before the international break. This week, as we take stock of the Bundesliga during the March international break, the word most applicable to what's going on is " Aufholjagd " ("race to catch up").

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs Bochum Prediction: Team News, Predicted Lineups and Where To Watch
arts.sum: Defending champions Bayer Leverkusen will be looking to return to domestic duties with a win when they host Bochum in the Bundesliga tonight. Ahead of the game, we’ve made a prediction for the ...

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen’s Patrik Schick to challenge Harry Kane for the Torjägerkanone
arts.sum: I believe in it a bit - But above all, we want to put pressure on Bayern. Harry Kane is not exactly hitting the same goal scoring heights he did in his first season at Bayern Munich, but he’s still a capable goal scorer for he has 21 goals in the Bundesliga so far.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen predicted Line-up vs Bochum
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen will look to close the gap to Bayern Munich to three points when they host Bochum in the Bundesliga on Friday night. Xabi Alonso will be without defensive…

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen prepared to take a risk with Florian Wirtz
arts.sum: Florian Wirtz suffered an ankle injury on March 8 but could return for Bayer Leverkusen earlier than expected. Speaking in Thursday’s press conference, Xabi Alonso hinted that they would be…
